messages.subject: KYOTO TWILIGHT
messages.msgSnippet: Logo: http://1happyturtle.com/K-Light/K-light2.jpg A friend and I created an alternate universe for the Shinsengumi...it s not crazy sci-fi futuristic or
messages.messageBody:
Logo:
http://1happyturtle.com/K-Light/K-light2.jpg

A friend and I created an alternate universe for the Shinsengumi...it's
not "crazy" sci-fi futuristic or anything.

We quickly sketched a premis.

It won't go into the details of the story yet...we just wanted to
establish a "universe" however some of the material in the sketch is
not detailed in the actual series (we pretend as if it's an animated
series).

http://1happyturtle.com/K-Light/KYOTOTWILIGHT.doc

you can direct comments/gripes/ridicule off-list to secretarytocapt3(at)
hotmail.com XD

we were just having fun...
